content:
System.Drawing.Configuration Namespace

Definition

The System.Drawing.Configuration namespace contains a class that supports configuration for classes in the System.Drawing namespace.

In this Article

Classes

SystemDrawingSection

Represents the configuration section used by classes in the System.Drawing namespace.
